description.fr: Vaincre tous les Cochons. \--- {%FightStarted} Ajoute le sort {Spell:202411} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Pigs. \--- {%FightStarted} Adds the {Spell:202411} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los cerdos. \--- {%FightStarted} Añade el hechizo {Spell:202411} a tu mano.
description.de: Besiege alle Schweinemonster. \--- {%FightStarted} Fügt den Zauber {Spell:202411} deiner Hand hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Porcos. \--- {%FightStarted} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:202411} à sua mão.
